The '''moobloom''' was a proposed mob featured in the [[2020 Mob Vote|Mob Vote]] during [[Minecraft Live 2020]], alongside the [[iceologer]] and [[glow squid]].<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-live-vote-for-next-mob|Minecraft Live: Vote For The Next Mob|September 27, 2020|Sofia Dankis}}</ref> It would have been a [[Earth:Buttercup|buttercup]] variant of the [[mooshroom]], and had some form of interaction with [[bee]]s, possibly a symbiotic one that involved the flowers of its head and back. 

The moobloom lost in the first round with 28.3% of the votes.<ref>{{tweet|mc|1312432010431016960|The Mob Vote is open! You have 20 minutes to pick your favourite: Moobloom, Iceologer or Glow Squid! Vote now!|October 3, 2020}}</ref>
